Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Player>, java.io.Serializable
    A class containing attributes that identify a single player and methods used to keep track of user's progress in the game.
    Author:
    Stefano Formicola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
